nodes.bodyText:
This explanation belongs in the Jira, not in a comment in the code.  When looking at current code, it's not really clear why you are talking about TreeMap at all.
Also, I think this comment misses the point of the TreeMap.  The reason a TreeMap was used here was to maintain a sorted order, which allowed the checkLeases() to exit the while loop as soon as it hit an unexpired lease.
The new design removes the need for the TreeMap by pruning the list it passes to checkLeases().
This LOG.isDebugEnabled() check is not needed anymore.
